original_text: When he comes, he will show the people of this world what they are like. He will show clearly that they are wrong. They are wrong about what sin really is. They are wrong about who is right with God. They are wrong about how God judges people.
korean_text: 그가 와서 죄에 대하여, 의에 대하여, 심판에 대하여 세상을 책망하시리라

sentences.original_text: he will show the people of this world
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 이 세상 사람들에게 보여줄 것입니다

sentences.original_text: They are wrong about what sin really is
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 죄가 정말 무엇인지에 대해 틀렸습니다

sentences.original_text: They are wrong about who is right with God
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 누가 하나님과 옳은 관계에 있는지에 대해 틀렸습니다

sentences.original_text: They are wrong about how God judges people
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 하나님이 사람들을 어떻게 심판하시는지에 대해 틀렸습니다
